items.name: Nanyuki Skybound Adventure Park
items.short_description: Soar through the Nanyuki skies on thrilling ziplines and conquer challenging ropes courses amidst breathtaking views of Mount Kenya. Perfect for adrenaline junkies and families alike.
items.address: Nanyuki-Doldol Road, near Ol Pejeta Conservancy turn-off

items.name: Mount Kenya Heights Eco-Lodge
items.short_description: Experience sustainable luxury in an exclusive eco-lodge offering panoramic views of Mount Kenya. Enjoy personalized service, organic cuisine, and serene nature walks.
items.address: Off Nanyuki-Meru Road, foothills of Mount Kenya

items.name: Equator Art & Culture Centre
items.short_description: Discover the vibrant creativity of local and regional artists at Nanyuki's newest art hub. Featuring diverse exhibits, workshops, and a focus on East African heritage.

items.name: The Shamba Kitchen & Deli
items.short_description: Savor fresh, organic dishes made with ingredients sourced directly from local Nanyuki farms. A delightful culinary experience focusing on sustainability and taste.

items.name: Nanyuki Wildlife Rescue Centre
items.short_description: Witness the incredible work of wildlife conservationists rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals. Learn about local wildlife and the efforts to protect them. Educational and inspiring.
items.address: Near Ol Pejeta Conservancy, Nanyuki-Rumuruti Road

items.name: Equator Star Glamping Retreat
items.short_description: Unwind in luxurious canvas tents under the vast Nanyuki sky. Enjoy unparalleled stargazing, bonfire nights, and comfortable amenities in a pristine natural setting.

items.name: Mount Kenya Craft Brewery
items.short_description: Tour Nanyuki's first craft brewery and sample a range of unique, locally-inspired beers. Learn about the brewing process and enjoy the lively atmosphere of the taproom.

items.name: Nanyuki Artisan Market
items.short_description: Explore a vibrant weekly market showcasing handmade crafts, unique souvenirs, and fresh local produce from Nanyuki's talented artisans and farmers.

items.name: Equator Wellness Retreat & Spa
items.short_description: Rejuvenate your mind and body at this tranquil retreat offering holistic spa treatments, yoga sessions, and mindful workshops amidst the serene Nanyuki landscape.

items.name: Nanyuki Enduro Trails
items.short_description: Explore exhilarating mountain bike trails designed for all skill levels, from gentle rides to challenging descents. Rent equipment on-site and experience Nanyuki's natural beauty on two wheels.
items.address: Dedan Kimathi University Road, near Nanyuki Airstrip
